name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My Social and Online Business Web Application

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hi, good day to you. In order to run and grow  your business better than ever, your business needs to have well organized social…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hi, good day to you. In order to run and grow  your business better than ever, your business needs to have well organized social network to communicate among fellow staffs, partners, customers, supply chains etc., we have services via partial social media platform website. In that website, you can create your own organization base on the names of your  business, products, services etc. then you can freely post message, photos, videos related to your group. Participants can comment on post, reply on comments via message, photos, videos. Participants can upload, delete, edit post video and photo many times. Participants can talk live video calls on the spot. Poster can also receive SMS alerts, while in offline, from website by participants. Organization can receive payments via local bank accounts, Master, Visa cards through PayPal account. We encourage you to  explore our website  ‘ oki4all.com ‘ . Our platform is similar to v...r but you don’t need to reveal your phone number to use. You don’t need to be stuck in one device one user rule. Our platform is similar to f...book but you can post video files directly in comment and reply modes instead of video links. You can remove multiple photos & videos, add multiple photos & videos, edit message concurrently even in edit mode.
